DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assure consumer successfully use new version A1CNow+ along revise instructional material .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assure consumer could successfully use new version A1CNow+ Test Kit along revise instructional material . The primary objective establish accuracy secondary objective establish precision , comprehension instructional material , user feedback overall test experience .
